SearchListSpec.Name: MIMED Batch Search
SearchListSpec.Description: A search list for locating MIMED Batch records
SearchListSpec.Author: UM Dev

SPSearchList.c:CreateProcedureSQL: create procedure dbo.USR_USP_SEARCHLIST_UMHS_BATCH_PROVIDERS_DUPCHECK ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null -- Provider ID ,@PROVIDERDRNUMBER nvarchar(50) = null ,@UMEMPLID nvarchar(200) = null ,@UMUNIQUENAME nvarchar(200) = null ,@MAXROWS smallint = 500 ) as select top(@MAXROWS) p.ID ,p.CONSTITUENTID ,p.PROVIDERDRNUMBER ,a1.ALTERNATELOOKUPID as UMEMPLID ,a2.ALTERNATELOOKUPID as UMUNIQUENAME ,c.KEYNAME as LASTNAME ,c.FIRSTNAME ,p.DATECHANGED ,100.0 as MATCHPERCENTAGE ,N'PROVIDERDRNUMBER' as MATCHEDON from dbo.USR_UMHS_PROVIDERS p inner join dbo.CONSTITUENT c on c.ID=p.CONSTITUENTID inner join dbo.ALTERNATELOOKUPID a1 on a1.CONSTITUENTID=c.ID inner join dbo.ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODE atc1 on atc1.ID=a1.ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODEID inner join dbo.ALTERNATELOOKUPID a2 on a2.CONSTITUENTID=c.ID inner join dbo.ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODE atc2 on atc2.ID=a2.ALTERNATELOOKUPIDTYPECODEID where p.PROVIDERDRNUMBER=@PROVIDERDRNUMBER and atc1.ID = '97CE11D1-6793-47D5-9FEE-B54B90DA16DA' -- University of Michigan ID-UMID and atc2.ID = '4073AA02-1416-4F6F-9238-9FCEFDEE6423' -- U-M Uniqname
